/chat/link.categorization: If the user just needs a quick link to a website or documentation
/chat/link.designation: Find a link to a website or documentation

/chat/conversational.categorization: Non-informative Conversational, not relying on recent events. Anything before 2021

/chat/informative-online.categorization: Question that needs a search or context to be resolved, or a user asks to 'look up'/'find out'; data past year 2021
/chat/informative-online.designation: Answer questions with context/references using the internet

/chat/location-lookup.categorization: Info about a store, business location, or info about a place near them ("find me a place")
/chat/location-lookup.designation: Find details on a store, business or location

/chat/informative-offline.categorization: Informative question that can be resolved without a search (events happen before 2021)

/chat/conversational-recent-events.categorization: Conversational question or discussion that relies on recent events
